title: OPPO Reno 7 series lands in India alongside the OPPO Watch Free
content:
As expected, OPPO today officially unveiled the Reno 7 series in India. While the Reno 7 series in China featured three models, the company is only bringing the regular Reno 7 and Reno 7 Pro to India, skipping the Reno 7 SE. Alongside new smartphones, OPPO has also launched the OPPO Watch Free in India.

The post OPPO Reno 7 series lands in India alongside the OPPO Watch Free appeared first on xda-developers.
description: OPPO has officially launched the % Reno 7 Pro, Reno 7 Pro and OPPO Watch Free in India. Here's what you need to know.
